alert.note: Alert for Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 4:31AM EDT until July 02 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Plymouth County in southeastern Massachusetts... * Until 500 AM EDT. * At 430 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Scituate, or near Marshfield, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Marshfield, Hingham, Scituate, Hanover, Norwell, Hull and Cohasset. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
